revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 55:;Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus, drachmas 12;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son ofApollonios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 44 obols 28;;(Pharmouthi) 19 likewise:;Zoidous, daughter of Petesouchos (wife of Ptolemaios, son of Kolo());;(in left margin: drachmas 40 obols 5) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges obols 5.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 4 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;for land plots in release likewise obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4.5 chalki 2;;And to Petheus, son of Petheus;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 3, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 4;;eparourion drachmas 2 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 7 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 8 obols 2, surcharges obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 8 obols 5 chalki 2;;naubion ofthe katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, obols 3;;Petesouchos, son of Heraklas, grandson of Heraklas, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 4;;Charmos, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Apollonous, drachmas 4;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Longinia Gemella (Tientil):;(in left margin: drachmas 96 obols 9) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 10, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 2.5, naubion drachma 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 3;;eparourion drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges obols 3.5, kollybos obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 22 obols 3 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 25, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5, in total drachmas 26 obols 3.5;;tax on vine crops for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, naubion obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2;;eparourion obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chaki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;tax on another vine field for the 12th year at Patsotnis belonging to Anthes during Germanicus Caesar ;;apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 4, surcharge obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obol 1;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 3.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL III, 113 (on l. 2275); BL X, 124 (on l. 2253). Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
